
### Juliacon Local

**JuliaCon Local Eindhoven 2023** was a one-day conference held on **December 1, 2023**, at the High Tech Campus Conference Center in Eindhoven, Netherlands¹². The event was co-hosted with PyData Eindhoven 2023, creating a unique opportunity for cross-pollination between the Julia and Python communities¹.

The conference featured a full day of talks, workshops, and networking sessions, covering a wide range of topics related to the Julia programming language². Highlights included a Pluto Workshop held the day before the main event, focusing on reactive and reproducible notebooks for Julia¹.

The event also emphasized inclusivity, offering diversity scholarships to individuals from underrepresented groups¹. Overall, it was a vibrant gathering for Julia enthusiasts to learn, share, and connect.
